comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Field Marshal William Riddell Birdwood, 1st Baron Birdwood, GCB, GCSI, GCMG, GCVO, CIE, DSO, GCTE, GOA (13 September 1865 – 17 May 1951) was a First World War British general who is best known as the commander of the Australian and New Zealand Army Corps (ANZAC) during the Gallipoli Campaign in 1915." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Birdwood,_1st_Baron_Birdwood

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog:  Thank you for the information about Birdwood and hist connection to the Gallipoli Campaign during World War I. We will add more details to the description when we update.
